text: Rhéal Paul Cormier (April 23, 1967 – March 8, 2021) was a Canadian professional baseball left-handed relief pitcher. He played in Major League Baseball (MLB), for the St. Louis Cardinals, Boston Red Sox (twice), Montreal Expos, Philadelphia Phillies, and Cincinnati Reds for 16 seasons, between 1991 through 2007. On March 8, 2021, Cormier died of pancreatic cancer at the age of 53. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Canadian baseball players Category:Cincinnati Reds players Category:Montreal Expos players Category:Sportspeople from Moncton Category:Philadelphia Phillies players Category:St. Louis Cardinals players
title: Rhéal Cormier
